page.title: 04A SCHOOLBOY'S YEAR
page.content: { Gobowen}is not a very exciting place but we hold lots of fetes and other annual events.Every Friday night I go to the local{cub pack}where we play games, make weather reports, hold quizzes and sometimes go camping. Other groups for children include beavers, brownies, guides and scouts. I attend{school}from Monday to Friday, it is by the noisy A5 road. We have annual trips to places such as Chester Zoo, Acton Scott Farm Museum and this year visited Liverpool's Maritime Museum and cruised on the River Mersey. The village has a huge{playing field which is being transformed into a world of its own. It will have tennis courts,a bowling green and an adventure playground.We also have a {bank, post office, newsagent, grocers, {two public houses and a chip shop.
